com.netflix.governator.providers

Class SingletonProvider<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.providers.SingletonProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public abstract class SingletonProvider<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Providers that which to enforce singleton semantics for a type. Note that this class is needed since annotating a Provider with @Singleton makes the Provider a singleton and NOT the type is it providing. So the same Provider is returned when the Provider is injector the a new call to get() is made whenever the type T is injected.
    Author:
    elandau
